name: Dino Run (FatDino)
description:
The game from my video, inspired by Temple Run.

Controls:

Double click left mouse button in start room to start run.

Jump - Space/W

Turn left/right - A/D

Roll/force landing - S

There are some known issues like camera glitch when dino spawns right before camera supposed to change position etc, be aware.

To restart game press alt+f4.
